title: Theme Configuration
description: Design tokens for colors, typography, spacing, and animations

theme-token-references.description: Reference theme design tokens from any category (colors, fonts, spacing, animations, etc.)
theme-token-references.usage: Use in component styles, props, or CSS-like properties to apply theme values

resolution.lookup: Dot-notation path resolves to token value in theme configuration
resolution.nested: Supports nested properties: theme.fonts.body.family accesses fonts.body.family
resolution.runtime: Resolved at build time, compiled into CSS or inline styles
resolution.fallback: If token not found, should fail build with clear error message

benefits: DRY: Single source of truth for all design tokens
Consistency: All components reference same tokens
Maintainability: Change one token, update entire app
Type safety: Can be validated at build time
Themability: Easy to swap themes by changing token values
Cross-category: Unified syntax for all design token types

integration.languages: Theme tokens work alongside $t: translation references. Example: { color: 'theme.colors.primary', children: ['$t:button.save'] }
integration.blocks: Blocks can reference theme tokens in their default styles or variable values
integration.pages: Pages apply theme tokens via component props and section styles
